channel.title: .Bat on Siyang's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in .Bat on Siyang's Blog

item.title: [破事水]机房个性化工具
item.description: 忽然发现，这是这一周一来唯一一篇博文。 @echo off echo 当前盘符：%~d0 ::0. 显示文件后缀名 reg add "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced" /v "HideFileExt" /t REG_DWORD /d 00000000 ::1. 壁纸 set regadd=reg add "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Desktop %regadd%" /v TileWallpaper /d "0" /f ::0为居中，1为平铺 %regadd%" /v Wallpaper /d "%~d0\Mine\壁纸\wallhaven-312106.jpg" /f %regadd%" /v WallpaperStyle /d "10" /f ::WallpaperStyle6为适应，2为拉伸，10为填充 start RunDll32.exe USER32.DLL,UpdatePerUserSystemParameters ::更换完成 ::2. Hosts xcopy "%~d0\Mine\GFW\hosts" "%~dp0" xcopy "%~dp0\hosts" "C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc" ipconfig /flushdns ::3. 常用文件拷贝 xcopy %~dp0\ZhangSiyang\* /E D:\ZhangSiyang\ /Y xcopy %~dp0\stu\* /E D:\stu\ /Y echo 继续？ pause ::4.
